text:
The #COVID19 challenge is still in front of us, but there are #VaccineDevelopment lessons we can begin applying now to prepare for future #vaccine and therapeutics #manufacturing emergencies.

Pharma sector lead & vaccine SME, Christa Myers, has the story: https://t.co/wuIL7XDcj2 https://t.co/qGvLeLMnDd
